constraint.name: ca_verifactu_registros_facturas_empresas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idempresa) REFERENCES empresas (idempresa) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_verifactu_registros_facturas_facturascli
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idfactura) REFERENCES facturascli (idfactura) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_verifactu_registros_facturas_nick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_verifactu_registros_facturas_ejercicios
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codejercicio) REFERENCES ejercicios (codejercicio) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE
